Gonorrhea Is Becoming Untreatable, U.N. Health Officials Warn - The U.N. health agency released new guidelines warning doctors that it no longer recommends an entire class of antibiotics, quinolones, because quinolone-resistant strains of the disease have emerged all over the world.

"Pope Francis on Wednesday [31 August 2016] announced major changes to the Vatican bureaucracy, slimming down the number of offices and giving himself direct charge of migration issues, continuing a reform push he promised when elected more than three years ago."
Two Canadian women could be facing life in prison for smuggling cocaine worth £17.5m into Australia on a cruise ship they'd been travelling on.
